name: USoundSubmix
doc: Sound Submix class meant for applying an effect to the downmixed sum of multiple audio sources.

AmbisonicsPluginSettings: Optional settings used by plugins which support ambisonics file playback.
EnvelopeFollowerAttackTime: The attack time in milliseconds for the envelope follower. Delegate callbacks can be registered to get the envelope value of sounds played with this submix.
EnvelopeFollowerReleaseTime: The release time in milliseconds for the envelope follower. Delegate callbacks can be registered to get the envelope value of sounds played with this submix.
OutputVolumeModulation: The output volume of the submix in Decibels. Applied after submix effects and analysis are performed.
WetLevelModulation: The wet level of the submixin Decibels. Applied after submix effects and analysis are performed.
DryLevelModulation: The dry level of the submix in Decibels. Applied before submix effects and analysis are performed.
OnSubmixRecordedFileDone: Blueprint delegate for when a recorded file is finished exporting.
bMuteWhenBackgrounded: Mute this submix when the application is muted or in the background. Used to prevent submix effect tails from continuing when tabbing out of application or if application is muted.
bSendToAudioLink: Whether to send this Submix to AudioLink (when AudioLink is Enabled)

methods.name: AddEnvelopeFollowerDelegate
methods.doc:
Adds an envelope follower delegate to the submix when envelope following is enabled on this submix.
@param  OnSubmixEnvelopeBP      Event to fire when new envelope data is available.

methods.name: AddSpectralAnalysisDelegate
RemoveSpectralAnalysisDelegate
methods.doc:
Remove a spectral analysis delegate.
@param  OnSubmixSpectralAnalysisBP          The event delegate to remove.

methods.name: SetSubmixDryLevel
methods.doc: Sets the output volume of the submix in linear gain. This dynamic level acts as a multiplier on the DryLevel property of this submix.

methods.name: SetSubmixOutputVolume
methods.doc: Sets the output volume of the submix in linear gain. This dynamic volume acts as a multiplier on the OutputVolume property of this submix.

methods.name: SetSubmixWetLevel
methods.doc: Sets the output volume of the submix in linear gain. This dynamic level acts as a multiplier on the WetLevel property of this submix.

methods.name: StartEnvelopeFollowing
methods.doc: Start envelope following the submix output. Register with OnSubmixEnvelope to receive envelope follower data in BP.

methods.name: StartRecordingOutput
methods.doc: Start recording the audio from this submix.

methods.name: StartSpectralAnalysis
methods.doc: Start spectrum analysis of the audio output.

methods.name: StopEnvelopeFollowing
methods.doc: Start envelope following the submix output. Register with OnSubmixEnvelope to receive envelope follower data in BP.

methods.name: StopRecordingOutput
methods.doc: Finish recording the audio from this submix and export it as a wav file or a USoundWave.

methods.name: StopSpectralAnalysis
methods.doc: Stop spectrum analysis of the audio output.
